title: Stuck on 'Authenticating' during Login Page
body: I enter my password and it says I'm 'Authenticating' during the Login In page. Anyone have the same issue right now?

replies.body: same thing happened to me been 2 days tried everything :/

Getting stuck there typically means that you're network is getting hung up for some reason while talking with our servers. This might be due to some wonky network settings, but let's cover all our bases with this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Hit me back if that doesn't get you logged in!

hey so not op but I tried to do anything that seemed to apply on the connections guide and ran the hextech tool and nothing worked i really dont want to stop playing the game but as of right now i cant even log on
What's happening when you attempt to launch / login?
